thread.title: Clinton To Detail Sweeping Plan To Rein In Wall Street
thread.title_full: Clinton To Detail Sweeping Plan To Rein In Wall Street

author: Susie Madrak
title: Clinton To Detail Sweeping Plan To Rein In Wall Street
text:
Latest Comments spirak • 1 min ago 
Hey Larry! Eight years ago when you first told all us good Merikans that the blah guy would come for our guns, I dug a foxhole in the yard, armed myself to the teeth, planted My Cold Dead Hands sign and waited for hostilities to begin. My question for you now, "Is it ok to get out of my foxhole for a few minutes and change my underwear or is he still on the way? Roger Miller • 1 min ago 
good poem but it doesn't matter who the wackjob republicans put in as speaker. they still will GET NOTHING DONE that will help americans get decent jobs and live better and safer lives. but the hole-in-the-head-gang keeps pulling that 'R' lever in the voting booth. go figure!!!!
